lyric_text:
I wanna go home, I wanna go home
Oh, how I wanna go home

Last night I went to sleep in Detroit City
And I dreamed about those cottonfields and home
I dreamed about my mother dear, old papa, sister and brother
I dreamed about that girl who's been waiting for so long
I wanna go home, I wanna go home, oh, how I wanna go home

Homefolks think I'm big in Detroit City
From the letters that I write they think I'm fine
But by day I make the cars, by night I make the bars
If only they could read between the lines

Cause you know I rode the freight train north to Detroit City
And after all these years I find I've just been wastin' my time
So I just think I'll take my foolish pride
And put it on a Southbound freight and ride
And go on back to the loved ones, the ones that I left waitin' so far behind

I wanna go home, I wanna go home
Oh, how I wanna go home...

Would you take me in? Are you lonely in the dark?
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark

You pinch yourself but the memories are all you feel
Can you break away from your alibis?
Can you make a play? Will you meet me in the dark?
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark, ha-ha-ha

Don't ya need me? Oh yeah
Don't ya need me? Hey, hey
Don't ya need me? Oh yeah

You make the rounds, ah you try to be so sincere
You guard your hopes and you pocket your dreams
You'd trade it all to avoid an unpleasant scene

Can you feel the fire? Will you love me in the dark?
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark
In the dark, ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha

lyric_text:

"We'll dress him up warmly and we'll send him to school"

And she told him, "We must attend to her needs"
"She's so much younger than you"
[PreChorus]
Well, he ran down the hall and he cried
Oh, how could his parents have lied?
When they said he was their only son
He thought he was their only one
[Chorus]

Oh, what a lonely boy

Goodbye, Mama
Goodbye, you

lyric_text:
Hoo, hee-hee-hee, yeah
We've got CD's, tapes and videos

We got books and magazines to read
On everything from A to Z
And a web to surf
From anywhere we are
But I hope with all this information
Buzzin' through our brains
That we will not let our hearts forget
The most important thing
Is love, love, love, love, love
It's all about love, love, love, love, love
Everything else comes down to this
Nothing any higher on the list than love
It's all about love
Now, they're fighting in the Middle East
And they're fighting down on 7th street
And there are fights in my own house
On given days
It's like something's lurking deep inside
That can't seem to be satisfied
But life was not meant
To be lived this way
'Cause it's true for every man and woman
Every boy and girl
That our only hope for livin' here
Together in this world
Is love, love, love, love, love
It's all about love, love, love, love, love
Everything else comes down to this
Nothing any higher on the list than love
This is the reason we were made
To know the love of our Creator
And to give the love he's given us away
Yeah, the maker and the Father
And the God of everything
He says to love, love, love
He says, "Love, love, love
Love, love, love"
'Cause after all it's all about love
God says, "Love, love, love, love, love"
(Yeah, yeah)
It's all about love, love, love, love, love
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
Everything else comes down to this
Nothing any higher on the list than love
'Cause after all it's all about love, yeah
That's right, yeah
It's all about, yeah, yeah, what it's all about
All a-, all about love, love, love, love, love
(It's all about love, love)
Yeah, it's all about love, love, love, love, love
(It's all about love, love)
Yeah, it's all about love, love, love
(It's all about love, love, love)
It's all about love, love, love, love, love
(It's all about love, love, love)
It's all about love, I can rock up your soul

lyric_text:
Early one morning with time to kill
I borrowed Jeb's rifle and sat on the hill
I saw a lone rider crossing the plain
I drew a bead on him to practice my aim
And my brother's rifle went off in my hand
A shot rang out across the land
The horse he kept running, the rider was dead
I hung my head, I hung my head
I set off running to wake from the dream
And my brother's rifle went into the stream
I kept on running into the salt lands
And that's where they found me, my head in my hands
The sheriff he asked me, "Why had I run"
Then it came to me just what I had done
And all for no reason, just one piece of lead
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
Here in the courthouse, the whole town is there
And I see the judge high up in his chair
Explain to the courtroom what went through your mind
And we'll ask the jury what verdict they find
I said, "I felt the power of death over life
I orphaned his children, I widowed his wife
I beg their forgiveness, I wish I was dead
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
Early one morning with time to kill
I see the gallows up on the hill
Out in the distance, a trick of the brain
I see a lone rider crossing the plain
Now he come to fetch me to see what they done
And we'll ride together 'til kingdom come
I pray for God's mercy, for soon I'll be dead
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head, I hung my head
label: sad

lyric_text:
I'm not happy with this conversation*
Too little righteous indignation
I'm not sure if I'm mad or mean
The tears I cry could mean anything
Just cause you're kin I let it slide
Insults and judgments I've been blind
And it hard for you to deal out digs
With a calloused heart your words are quick
I'm sick and tired of throwing stones
Cause all that leaves is broken bones
And I won't shed no blood for you
Aww the cuts too deep the bruise too blue
I've wasted time and been hand fed
You can't take back the things you said
Too much time has gone and passed
Shattered lives and broken glass
The pain is felt behind my eyes
But you won't see me through my disguise
Can't change fate cause this is done
Aww too late to start the race is run
Now's the time to face the facts
This train done slid right off the tracks
Regret is sad revenge is sweet
I'm walking on my own two feet
You could have come along but you broke my heart
Now's the time for me to start
Living my life without you
Being a rock in my shoe
Can't write the book cause this one's wrote
Time's a friend and love's a foe
The future's mine indeed it's grand
You ain't a part of my plan
When you lay down and think of me
There won't be much serenity
Just know that the aching in your brain
Is the sound of your soul's grief and pain
This apple's done fall off the Family Tree
This apple's done fall off the Family Tree

lyric_text:
The old hometown looks the same as I step down from the train
And there to meet me is my mama and papa
And down the road I look and there runs Mary
Hair of gold and lips like cherries
It's good to touch the green green grass of home
Yes they've all come to meet me
Arms are reached smiling sweetly
It's so good to touch the green green grass of home
The old house is still standing though the paint is cracked and dry
And there's that old oak tree that I used to play on
Down the lane I walked with my sweet Mary hair of gold and lips like cherries
It's good to touch the green green grass of home
Then I awake and look around me at these four grey walls that surround me
And I realize that I was only dreaming
For there's a guard and there's the sad old padre
Arm in arm we'll walk at daybreak
When again I'll touch the green green grass of home
They'll all come to see me in the shade of that old oak tree
As they lay me neath the green green grass of home

Till love's all over

[Verse 6]

To every mountain top and steeple
Let it be felt by every soul
Till love's all over

Our love's all people

lyric_text:
I woke up near Rittenhouse Square
There was noise in the hall; snow was flowing in the air
And I could see just then the flashing spark
Of the match to my first smoke
Some houses are built to last
It's the couple inside that change too fast
I can see their faces looking through the glass
They're not where they belong

I want to stay with you, babe
Won't you let me stay?
You're a beautiful girl
I'm right where I belong, babe
I'm here with you
You're a beautiful girl

I see your feet at the edge of the bed
While an old love song's creeping into your head
And as your eyes just closed I could only guess
If you were dreaming of me again
Stained glass casts a flickering light
With the curtains closed I can't tell if it's night
But I know for sure that this sure feels right
With you here between my arms

I want to stay with you, babe
Won't you let me stay?
You're a beautiful girl
I'm right where I belong, babe
I'm here with you
You're a beautiful girl
And I hope that you can take me
When I'm going out of my head
And I hope that you will keep me
Keep me warm in your bed

I want to stay with you, babe
Won't you let me stay?
You're a beautiful girl
Right where I belong, babe
Here with you
You're a beautiful girl
I want to stay with you, babe
Won't you let me stay?
You're a beautiful girl
I'm right where I belong, babe
I'm here with you
You're a beautiful girl

lyric_text:
I put away the groceries
And I take my daily bread

And I hope you're wishing on that same bright star

So please, come home soon

Even though we're far apart

Round my neck, pressed to my heart
I wonder, I pray
I sleep alone, I cry alone

So please, come home soon

lyric_text:
[Verse 1]
One day while bathing in the sea
My talking dolphin spoke to me
He spoke to me in symphony
From freedom's peace beneath the sea
He looked to me eyes full of love
Said, "Yes, we live behind the sun"
[Chorus]
Behind the sun
Behind the sun
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Behind the sun
[Verse 2]
The sun goes up and
And the sun gets down but
Like the heart of the sun
My heart continues to pound
[Chorus]
Behind the sun
[Verse 3]
Now while I shower in the rain
I watch my dolphin swim away
The one who listens to the surf
Can feel the pulse beat of the earth
And like my dolphin swims so free
The sun does swim into the sea
[Chorus]
Behind the sun
Behind the sun
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Behind the sun
Behind the sun
[Verse 4]
An island flying through the sky
One day your son might ask you why
And if your son should be a girl
She too might ask you of this world
The sun shines sweet upon your beach
And yes, my dolphin loves to teach
[Chorus]
Behind the sun
Behind the sun
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Behind the sun
[Verse 5]
The sun goes up
And the sun gets down
But like the heart of the sun
My heart continues to pound
[Chorus]
Behind the sun

lyric_text:

When the world is ready to fall

When you're only lonely
Now don't you ever be ashamed
You're only lonely

lyric_text:

Tonight you're mine completely
You give your love so sweetly

[Verse 3]

You say that I'm the only one

When the night meets the morning sun?

I'd like to know that your love

Will you still love me tomorrow?
[Verse 5]
So tell me now and I won't ask again
Will you still love me tomorrow?
Will you still love me tomorrow?

Cocoa hue

Afro blue

Burst at the height

Cocoa hue
Rich as the night
Afro blue

Until it seems it's not a dream
The two are you and me

Afro blue

Rich as the night

i float where the light goes, unafraid to drift
breeze in the window, time moving easy
label: relaxed

lyric_text:
every small heartbeat feels like a bright parade
i laugh out loud and the day laughs with me
label: happy

lyric_text:
i count the miles between breaths and call it home
night holds my hand where your shadow used to be
the room keeps your echo, soft and blue
label: sad

lyric_text:
no quiet left in me, only thunder in my chest
i keep walking through the fire till it learns my name
label: angry

lyric_text:
sparks on steel, i bite the dark back
no quiet left in me, only thunder in my chest
label: angry

lyric_text:
fire in my chest, I scream through the storm
every word cuts, every sound breaks free
label: angry

lyric_text:
waves roll easy, calm in their endless song
the air holds stillness, soft and wide
label: relaxed

lyric_text:
light spills over my heart, the day feels endless
joy hums low and steady, soft as a sunrise
smiles echo where silence once stood
label: happy

lyric_text:
rain whispers my name across the window glass
empty rooms hum with your fading sound
label: sad
